revised_title: Cytological Features of Fertilisation in Pinus silvestris
tldr: This paper provides a detailed account of the cytological processes of fertilisation in Pinus silvestris, including the formation of the ventral canal cell, the movement of the oosphere nucleus, and the behavior of the four nuclei in the egg. The study also examines the number of chromosomes in the egg nucleus and various types of sporophytic tissue.
